c301.AdventureBook.Models

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • c301.AdventureBook.Models.Annotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Annotation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This is an annotation class. An annotation is any form of review that a user can post to any particular page of the story. An annotation contains an author, a comment, and/or a list of media items. Current issues: For now, we only have one type of media, and that is the image type. Therefore for now, the list of media items is just imagePaths.
    Author:
    Lin Tong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Annotation

        public Annotation(String author,
          String comment)
        This is the constructor for the annotation Object. An annotation requires an author and a comment, both as string values. In order to add Images, addImage path function should be used after.
        Parameters:
        author - is the author for the annotaion
        comment - is the comment that use can post their feedback
